headline: Behr Paint Company Empowers New Homeowners to Pursue the Art of DIYconomics Through Relationship with REMAX Canada
summary: Brand collaboration inspires Canadians to personalize and transform their homes with colour and confidence on a budgetTORONTO, July 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Behr Paint Company, a leading paint manufacturer and champion of DIY and colour inspiration for home improvement, is proud to announce a collaboration with REMAX Canada, one of Canada’s leading real estate franchisors.
